Name: Chasing the Moon's Glory
Description: Not far away from Yumyum Haven, you meet Zhezhi, who is troubled by a lack of inspiration for her paintings. Ask her about it.
QuestDesc: Not far away from Yumyum Haven, you meet Zhezhi, who is troubled by a lack of inspiration for her paintings. Ask her about it.

Conditions.PreQuestName: Chasing the Moon, Here and Now

Options.PlotLineKey: (She's been standing there since the afternoon...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... "Capture the stalls and the Wishing Tree together, to show the festive atmosphere... ideally with the moon in the background." Ugh... should I find another spot to paint?

Options.PlotLineKey: What are you doing here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With these requirements... the composition... isn't right either...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh...! Sorry, are-are you talking to me?

Options.PlotLineKey: Yes.
Actually, I was talking to the hand floating behind you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What!? Wh-wh-what's behind me?!

Options.PlotLineKey: Hey, relax. I'm only kidding.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, don't s-scare me like that...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry... I didn't notice you there just now...

Options.PlotLineKey: I remember your name is...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (So {PlayerName} remembers me? But wait... did I tell {Male=him;Female=her} my name? We've only met once, so it's natural if {Male=he;Female=she} can't remember me...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Should I introduce myself one more time...? I should do something so it doesn't get awkward, right? Ugh, what to do...)

Options.PlotLineKey: Zhezhi. That's your name, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Y-yes! I'm Zhezhi. You got my name right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Oh thank goodness, {Male=he;Female=she} didn't forget me...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I remember you too! You said you go by the name Rover.

Options.PlotLineKey: The festival's over. Aren't you going home?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, the Artists of Huanglong have requested a painting for the Moon-Chasing Festival, and I'm still searching for inspiration... It's been a bit of a struggle, but I'll head back once it's done.

Options.PlotLineKey: It's getting pretty late.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, it's not that... Wait, is that the time already?!

Options.PlotLineKey: Everyone else has left.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's... that's okay. I prefer quiet places... Plus, I live right here in Jinzhou, not too far away...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Leaving her alone here... doesn't sit right.)

Options.PlotLineKey: Have you had dinner yet?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me? I'm not really that hungry—

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh...

Options.PlotLineKey: Let me cook something for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You borrow the stove at Yumyum Haven to cook some food with the ingredients you have.

Options.PlotLineKey: I borrowed Uncle Li's stove. Come on, give it a try.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? Thank you... But I still haven't finished my painting—

Options.PlotLineKey: Can't work on an empty stomach.
You can eat and look for inspiration at the same time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right... Don't mind if I do!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's sooo delicious! It's almost as good as Uncle Li's... No, it tastes even better with those extra seasonings.

Options.PlotLineKey: Thank you.
Oh, by the way, how was your Moon-Chasing Festival?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, um... It was okay, I guess. Nothing much, really... Hehe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Oh, should I be honest? No, no, I can't worry {Male=him;Female=her}. A little white lie won't hurt, right?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Actually...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I didn't get to enjoy it much. I've been swamped with tasks lately, and I had to help Miss Xiao at her fan drawing stall.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sitting at the stall was exhausting. Just an hour there, and I think I'd need a day to recover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, I couldn't find anyone to go to the festival with me. I feel like I can't breathe in crowded places, but going alone also felt awkward...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Wait, did I just blurt out everything?! Is it normal to spill my guts to someone I barely know? Weird... I'm not even feeling jittery... am I always this awkward?! Oh dear...)

Options.PlotLineKey: I see...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Does {Male=he;Female=she} think I'm complaining? Am I coming across as too annoying?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I, uh, I'm not saying I didn't have a good time! Thanks to the festival, I've had lots of work, and I got paid for looking after the stall. I've made enough in just these few days to pay off three or four months of debt!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (WHAT AM I SAYING! This just makes me sound miserable!)

Options.PlotLineKey: Well, I guess we're enjoying the festival together now.
Even though it's just the two of us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (...The two of us? Does that mean we're on a... No, no, no, I'd better stop here. What am I thinking!?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's good... just the two of us. Actually, it feels... right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Most of the stalls are closed...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But we can still make wishes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is...

Options.PlotLineKey: Have you ever made a wish?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not yet, but...

Options.PlotLineKey: Why not take this chance to make a wish?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before I make a wish, Rover, can I ask you a favor...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can-can I put you in my painting? You'll only need to stand there for ten minutes... or maybe five... or three, I promise!

Options.PlotLineKey: Why?
That's... a sudden request.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I don't know! I just have this overwhelming urge... I want to include you in this painting. I feel like I need to... No, I want to!

Options.PlotLineKey: Is this for the magazine?
Wouldn't it be a bit inappropriate to include me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, I'm not talking about the painting I'm being paid to create...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This painting, I want it to be... Just for myself.
